QuestData.Title: Agamaggan
QuestData.Description: I sense a being of immense power within these twisted thorns, $n. The entire area has come alive at its presence.$B$BIt must be the Spirit of Agamaggan! He was one of the first and most powerful beings to ever live - the Quilboar worship him fervently.$B$BAll the vines you see across the land are a result of his blood; of his sacrifice to save Azeroth in the War of the Ancients.$B$BIf there's any being that could steer the Quilboar towards their noble roots, it would be him.$B$BYou must seek him out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to the Spirit of Agamaggan.
QuestData.RewardText: <The Spirit of Agamaggan looks at you. An ancient voice echoes inside your head.>$B$BI've been waiting for you to come here.
